donate-menu-item: Donate to the Developer of MacDropAny
unable-to-sync-error-message: An error occured while syncing the folder
unable-to-sync-error-detail:
MacDropAny was unable to sync the folder $0 with $1.

Error details: $2
about-panel-credits:
MacDropAny is built with care and dedication by Sebastian Hallum Clarke.

Thank you to the many generous supporters who have contributed their time, resources, and effort to improve MacDropAny.

Thanks to the Goose for her support.
choose-folder-source-message: Choose a folder to sync with the cloud
choose-folder-target-message: Choose where in the cloud to sync this folder
sync-complete-detail: MacDropAny succesfully synced $0 with $1. Any changes to $2 will now automatically be reflected in $3.
subtitle: MacDropAny lets you sync any folder on your computer with the cloud
prerequisites-content: To use MacDropAny, you must already have a cloud storage service (like Dropbox or iCloud Drive) running on your computer.
how-macdropany-works-content: MacDropAny will move the folder you want to sync into this cloud storage service, and then MacDropAny will create a shortcut from the folder's original location to its new location in the cloud.
sync-your-folder-title: Sync Your Folder with the Cloud
Choose a folder to sync with the cloud: Choose a folder to sync with the cloud
step-subtitle-start: Drop a folder here or click to choose a folder
step-subtitle-folder-selected: Click to choose a different folder
source-folder-not-defined: The source folder has not been set
target-folder-not-defined: The target folder has not been set
source-and-target-are-same: The source folder and target folder are the same
source-folder-contains-target-folder: The target folder is inside the source folder
item-already-exists-in-target-with-same-: A file or folder already exists inside the target folder with the same name as the source folder
donation-prompt: If you like MacDropAny, please consider making a donation to the developer.
